keyword: in n out cheese burger calories
title: Calories in In-N-Out Cheeseburger
meta_description: Discover calories in In-N-Out cheeseburger (480 kcal), plus full nutrition breakdown including protein, fat, carbs, sodium, and quick tweaks for custom orders.
assumptions: Standard In-N-Out cheeseburger: toasted bun, beef patty, American cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, spread; no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, exact preparation, and customizations. Values based on official In-N-Out data; check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: An In-N-Out cheeseburger contains 480 calories with 22 g protein and 39 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging or apps.

faqs.q: How many calories in an In-N-Out cheeseburger?
What's the protein in In-N-Out cheeseburger?
faqs.a: About 22 g of protein per burger.

faqs.q: Are there trans fats in In-N-Out cheeseburger?
faqs.a: Yes, 1 g of trans fat from the beef patty.

faqs.q: How much sodium in In-N-Out cheeseburger calories query?
faqs.a: 950 mg sodium, mostly from cheese and spread.
3 g dietary fiber from veggies like lettuce and tomato.
